abstract.t: This document reproduces the content of the ITU-T Study Group 16White Document draft of H.248 Annex G, which is scheduled fordecision in Geneva in November 2000. H.248 Annex G providespackages for 'User Interface Elements and Actions'. Specifically,the packages in Annex G include:- Display- Key- Keypad- Label key- Function key- Indicator- Soft key- Ancillary inputThis document is submitted for IETF comment prior to ITU-T decision,in accordance with procedures currently being negotiated betweenITU-T Study Group and ISOC on behalf of the IETF.
